categories.name: SDE Full Stack

projects.name: SmartGoal AI
bullets: Built an AI-powered therapy analysis platform in collaboration with SUNY Buffalo and USC, enabling speech-language pathologists to generate visit notes, design activities, and track patient progress using therapist inputs for 300+ children.

projects.name: JobGenie
bullets: Architected Job Genie, an AI-driven sourcing platform that interprets complex job descriptions, surfaces the top five candidate matches by skill and experience, and accelerates recruiter workflows by 80% for data-driven hiring.

projects.name: CheckBot-Alpha
bullets: Developed an advanced Python checkers bot utilizing pygame library, integrating Random and 3-level Mini-max strategies; It demonstrated strategic depth by maintaining an impressive 85% win rate over 100 simulated matches.
